languages.text: {n}Не без хвастовства Ульфар демонстрирует вам угловатую, но в то же время изящную вязь рун, многократно охвативших вычищенный рог.{/n} "Когда я вернусь на Фенрис, то сагу о своем походе в Простор Коронус буду петь, запивая мьодом из него!"

{n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"
languages.original_text: {n}Не без хвастовства Ульфар демонстрирует вам угловатую, но в то же время изящную вязь рун, многократно охвативших вычищенный рог.{/n} "Когда я вернусь на Фенрис, то сагу о своем походе в Простор Коронус буду петь, запивая мьодом из него!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con algo de ostentación, Ulfar te muestra la angulosa pero grácil escritura rúnica que recorre el cuerno reluciente.{/n} «Cuando vuelva a Fenris, ¡beberé mjod con esto mientras canto la saga de mi visita a la Extensión de Koronus!».
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con algo de ostentación, Ulfar te muestra la angulosa pero grácil escritura rúnica que recorre el cuerno reluciente.{/n} «Cuando vuelva a Fenris, ¡beberé mjod con esto mientras canto la saga de mi visita a la Extensión de Koronus!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法兴致勃勃地向你展示着那个闪闪发光的角杯，周围刻满了棱角分明却又不失优雅的符文。{/n}“等我回到芬里斯之后，我会用这个角杯一边喝着蜜酒，一边颂唱着我进军科罗努斯扩区的史诗！”
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法兴致勃勃地向你展示着那个闪闪发光的角杯，周围刻满了棱角分明却又不失优雅的符文。{/n}“等我回到芬里斯之后，我会用这个角杯一边喝着蜜酒，一边颂唱着我进军科罗努斯扩区的史诗！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}これ見よがしの態度で、ウルファーは光り輝く角の周りに刻まれている、角ばってはいるものの優雅なルーンを見せる。{/n}「フェンリスに戻ったら、コロヌス・エクスパンスの行軍のサーガを歌いながら、これを使ってミョードを飲むんだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}これ見よがしの態度で、ウルファーは光り輝く角の周りに刻まれている、角ばってはいるものの優雅なルーンを見せる。{/n}「フェンリスに戻ったら、コロヌス・エクスパンスの行軍のサーガを歌いながら、これを使ってミードを飲むんだ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un geste solennel, Ulfar vous montre la calligraphie anguleuse, mais non moins élégante des runes gravées en spirales sur la corne étincelante.{/n} « Quand je regagnerai Fenris, je boirai du mjod dans cette corne tout en chantant la saga de ma campagne dans les Étendues de Koronus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un geste solennel, Ulfar vous montre la calligraphie anguleuse, mais non moins élégante des runes gravées en spirales sur la corne étincelante.{/n} « Quand je regagnerai Fenris, je boirai du mjod dans cette corne tout en chantant la saga de ma campagne dans les Étendues de Koronus ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einer theatralischen Geste präsentiert Ulfar dir die eckige, aber elegante Runenschrift, die sich um das glänzende Horn windet.{/n} "Wenn ich nach Fenris zurückkehre, werde ich hieraus Mjod trinken, während ich die Saga von meinem Marsch in die Koronus-Ausdehnung singe!"
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer theatralischen Geste präsentiert Ulfar dir die eckige, aber elegante Runenschrift, die sich um das glänzende Horn windet.{/n} "Wenn ich nach Fenris zurückkehre, werde ich hieraus Mjod trinken, während ich die Saga von meinem Marsch in die Koronus-Ausdehnung singe!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, parlak boynuzu çevreleyen kaba ama zarif duran rün yazılarını hafif gösterişli bir hareketle sana gösteriyor.{/n} "Fenris'e döndüğümde, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki yolculuğumun destanını okurken bu boynuzdan mjod içeceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}With something of a flourish, Ulfar shows you the angular yet graceful script of runes that wind around and around the gleaming horn.{/n} "When I return to Fenris, I will drink mjod from this while singing the saga of my march into the Koronus Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, hafif gösterişli bir hareketle parlak boynuzu çevreleyen kaba ama zarif gözüken rün yazılarını sana gösteriyor.{/n} "Fenris'e döndüğümde, Koronus Enginliği'ne yaptığım seferin destanını okurken bu boynuzdan mjod içeceğim!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
